Posts.Content: Nov 11, 2015 05:41PM Chaz wrote: Hello Muriel, After my chemo with taxotere I also had very sore feet and legs. I started taking a magnessium supplement and the pain stoped within 2 weeks. Ask your doctor if its ok for you to take it. Good luck.
